content.question: While debugging the program, the student realizes that the loop never terminates. Which of the following changes can be made so that the program works as intended?

choices.label: Inserting index ← index + 1 between lines 6 and 7
Inserting index ← index + 1 between lines 7 and 8
Inserting index ← index - 1 between lines 6 and 7
Inserting index ← index - 1 between lines 7 and 8

content.answer: Inserting index ← index - 1 between lines 7 and 8

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Identify and correct errors in algorithms and programs, including error discovery through testing.
